title: Trump Pulls Back on War with Iran & The Plain View Project Exposes Police Racism | Elaine Welteroth
itunes:title: Trump Pulls Back on War with Iran & The Plain View Project Exposes Police Racism | Elaine Welteroth
description:
President Trump makes a last-minute decision against bombing Iran, a database exposes cops' racist Facebook posts, and author Elaine Welteroth discusses "More Than Enough."
